answers.answer: You need to go to see your doctor.The problem with urinating so often could be from diabetes, or if you are a male from prostate problems.The doctor will probably take a blood test to check for diabetes and do a simple examination to see if the prostate has enlarged.Best wishes.

question: i am 63 yrs old and i cant sleep at night cos i have to pee every 30 minutes. i go 4 or 5 times during the day at work, but when i get home its the same every day and night. i do not have an infection.can you help me?
title: sleep disorders and urology
